info.name: 10x Banking APIs
info.description:
The 10x Platform is an innovative cloud-native platform that enables you to build, run, and expand your banking operations. It takes care of your core banking infrastructure while also giving you the tools to create bespoke products and take them to market. From logging into an account, to paying for gas from a current account, your customers' everyday banking experiences can be powered and enabled in real-time by our cloud-native technology.

The 10x Platform's benefits are vast. At a high level, though, they enable:

  • Faster innovation: Launch new and innovative products in minutes, not months.
  • Simplified operations: Streamlined deployment, integration, and infrastructure operations fully managed by 10x.
  • Real-time platform: Events record activity on the 10x Platform in real-time.
  • Configurable, customisable technology: Design a banking solution on the platform that works best for you.

Key Features:

1. Ready-Made Templates

Save time with our extensive library of pre-built API request templates. No need to start from scratch â€“ simply choose the template that fits your needs and start testing immediately.

2. Comprehensive API Documentation

Access detailed API documentation right within Postman. Understand endpoints, authentication methods, and payloads effortlessly, ensuring you're always on the same page with your API providers.

3. Test Automation

Easily automate your API tests with powerful scripts and workflows. Run the 10x Postman Collection top to bottom, end to end, while creating and utilizing environment variables along the way. Say goodbye to manual testing and hello to efficiency and accuracy.

4. Collaboration Made Easy

Collaborate seamlessly with your team using Postman's built-in sharing and version control features. Work together in real-time to build and refine your APIs.

5. Performance Monitoring

Track API performance and identify bottlenecks with our monitoring tools. Ensure your APIs are always running at peak efficiency.

Who Should Use It?

Developers: Simplify your API testing and development process.
Testers: Ensure your APIs meet quality standards.
API Enthusiasts: Explore and experiment with APIs effortlessly.

Get Started Today!

Don't miss out on the opportunity to revolutionize your API development process. Join the growing community of developers who have experienced the benefits of the 10x Postman Collection.
Ready to get started? Click 'Run in Postman' to get started and unlock the true potential of your API projects with the 10x Postman Collection!

Architecture

The diagrams below demonstrate how our platform works.

Overview

This is a simplified diagram of our platform architecture and how various modules related to one another:

In-depth view

This is a more elaborate breakdown of how each component of the 10x Platform communicates:

The 10x Platform consists of the 10x SuperCore and 10x SmartAdapters.

10x SuperCore is our flexible, scalable, and extensible cloud-native operating system for banks. It's the container that holds all our core modules and components, including Products, Parties (Customers), and Transactions. The 10x SuperCore provides a banking core as a managed service.

10x SmartAdapters are the pluggable, optional components of the 10x Platform that simplify and accelerate your banking operations, for example through data streaming or third party integrations.

Table of definitions

The collapsible table below defines each component listed above:

Glossary

Name Description
Channels The channels through which the customer communicates with your bank. These include mobile phones, laptops, ATM machines, physical bank branches, and point of sale terminals.
Client This your bank or financial institution represented in the diagram. On the 10x Platform, your customers communicate directly with your bank via the 10x Platform without communicating directly with us. This is also true for communication channels between you and our third-party applications or partners.
Salesforce Salesforce's CRM product integrates directly with the 10x Platform and also with your environments.
Colleagues Your bank colleagues who directly interact with Bank Manager and Salesforce.
HTTP APIs Enables clients and other services to communicate with the 10x Platform over the internet.
Data Streaming Captures data in real-time and processes it, for example when payments are made.
Bank Manager Our code-free web application that enables you to create products and manage them.
Tenants Separates access to data and other resources within the same infrastructure.
Products Financial products like checking, deposit, and lending products.
Parties A customer on the 10x Platform.
Subscriptions A customer account on the 10x Platform.
Transactions The movement of funds on the 10x Platform.
Financial tools A series of capabilities that enable you and your customers to collect information and manage it.
Events An action recognized and recorded by the 10x Platform.
Payments An optional module that enables you to manage inbound and outbound payments.
Cards An optional module that enables you to issue cards and manage them.
Fraud & AML A series of capabilities that enable you to tackle fraud and money laundering through the 10x Platform.
Partner Third-party partners like Paymentology that are integrated with the 10x Platform.
